title: CSL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 20 Operator Posts
description: Cochin Shipyard Limited (CSL) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for the 20 Operator Positions. Those candidates who have qualified in theÂ 8th, 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the CSL Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more detail...
